GULF OF GUINEA.
GABON.
PIRACY.
M/V POSSIBLY HIJACKED IN 00-26.49S 008-51.45E
AT 150452Z JUL. VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO KEEP
CLEAR OF THIS POSITION AND TO EXERCISE EXTREME
CAUTION. REPORTS TO IMB PIRACY REPORTING CENTER,
PHONE: 603 2031 0014, FAX: 603 2078 5769,
E-MAIL: IMBKL@ICC-CCS.ORG, PIRACY@ICC-CCS.ORG.
